title: John Mayall's Bluesbreakers - Live In 1967 (2015) [FLAC]
description:
The sound is really poor - it's a vintage audience recording, first time officially released 2015. But it's an amazing document of the short era in the Bluesbreaker's history with the later Fleetwood Mac lineup backing John Mayall - Peter Green, John McVie & Mick Fleetwood.

John Mayall's Bluesbreakers - Live In 1967 (Never Before Heard Live Performances)
Label: Forty Below Records - FBR 008
Format: CD, Album
Country: US
Released: 2015
Genre: Blues
Style: Modern Electric Blues
 

Tracklist:

1 	All Your Love 	3:45
2 	Brand New Start 	4:51
3 	Double Trouble 	7:33
4 	Streamline 	4:03
5 	Have You Ever Loved A Woman 	8:28
6 	Looking Back 	2:45
7 	So Many Roads 	5:55
8 	Hi Heel Sneakers 	7:26
9 	I Can't Quit You Baby 	4:29
10 	The Stumble 	6:45
11 	Someday After Awhile 	5:14
12 	San-Ho-Zay 	8:13
13 	Stormy Monday 	8:32


Lineup:

John Mayall - vocals, harmonica, organ
Peter Green - guitar
John McVie - bass
Mick Fleetwood - drums


Tracks 1,3,7,12 &13 recorded at Manor House 5 May 67
Tracks 2, 6 & 11 recorded at Bromley 29 Apr 67
Tracks 4 & 10 recorded at The Marquee Club 27 Apr 67
Tracks 5 & 8 recorded at The Ram Jam Club 1 Feb 67
Track 9 recorded at Klook's Kleek 28 Apr 67
